description: The District Transport Office (DTO) in Samastipur, identified by code BR-33, is the primary regulatory body for vehicle-related services in the Samastipur district of Bihar. It operates under the Darbhanga division and is responsible for issuing driving licenses, vehicle registrations, and enforcing road safety regulations under the Motor Vehicles Act.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building (Samaharaalaya), Samastipur, Bihar
